org.securityfilter.authenticator.persistent

Class DefaultPersistentLoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.securityfilter.authenticator.persistent.DefaultPersistentLoginManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, PersistentLoginManagerInterface

    public class DefaultPersistentLoginManager
extends Object
implements Serializable, PersistentLoginManagerInterface
    DefaultPersistentLoginManager manages the saving and retrieving of the persistant logins for the "remember me" functionality. This implementation uses client cookies to save the login information and incroporates cookie validation and encryption
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    David Reed (dreed10@neo.rr.com), Max Cooper (max@maxcooper.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultPersistentLoginManager()
      The constructor method initializes the cipherParameters variable in case the implementation intends to use encryption to secure user names and passwords

      • setCookieLife

        public void setCookieLife(String cookieLife)
        Set Cookie Life
        Parameters:
        cookieLife - The cookie life in days as defined in config file

      • setProtection

        public void setProtection(String protection)
        Set protection level for the "Remember Me" functionality
        Parameters:
        protection - The protection level as defined in config file.
        valid values are:
        ALL (this is the default)
        VALIDATION
        ENCRYPTION
        NONE

      • setValidationKey

        public void setValidationKey(String validationkey)
        Set the Validation Key used to generate hash value, the hash value is stored with the cookie and used to verify that the cookie has not been tampered with
        Parameters:
        validationkey - The validation key as defined in config file. This is a required config entry if protection is set to ALL or VALIDATION

      • setEncryptionKey

        public void setEncryptionKey(String encryptionkey)
        Set the Encryptin Key used to create a secret key, the secret key is passed to the Cipher object to be used during encryption and decryption of cookie values.

        NOTE: This entry in the config file must NOT appear before any of the other encryption config entries

        Parameters:
        encryptionkey - A String containing the encryption key as defined in config file. This is a required config entry if protection is set to ALL or ENCRYPTION.

      • setUseIP

        public void setUseIP(String useIP)
        Set the UseIP variable used to determine if the client's IP address should be included in the hash calculation when using validation
        Parameters:
        useIP - The UseIP as defined in config file.

      • setEncryptionAlgorithm

        public void setEncryptionAlgorithm(String encryptionAlgorithm)
        Set the Encryption Algorithm used to encrypt and decrypt cookies
        Parameters:
        encryptionAlgorithm - The encryptionAlgorithm as defined in config file.

      • setEncryptionMode

        public void setEncryptionMode(String encryptionMode)
        Set the Encryption Mode used to encrypt and decrypt cookies
        Parameters:
        encryptionMode - The encryptionMode as defined in config file.

      • setEncryptionPadding

        public void setEncryptionPadding(String encryptionPadding)
        Set the Encryption Padding used to encrypt and decrypt cookies
        Parameters:
        encryptionPadding - The encryptionPadding as defined in config file.
